title: Translate Into System
text: Since the sum of the two number is $$-30$$ we can write $$x+y=-30$$. Additionally one number is five times the other so we can write $$x=5y$$.

title: Solve the System
text:
Using substitution we can substitute $$x=5y$$ into $$x+y=-30$$ to solve for $$y$$.
$$x+y=-30$$
$$5y+y=-30$$
$$6y=-30$$

title: Solving for $$x$$
text: Given $$y=-5$$, plug the known value into one of the equations to solve for $$x$$. What is $$x$$?
